programme.title: Surveillance and espionage in the Cold War
programme.short_synopsis: Security concerns at the US embassy in Moscow and at the founding of the UN in 1945.
programme.medium_synopsis: The case of US marine Clayton Lonetree accused of espionage in Moscow reminds Cooke of how electronic surveillance was feared at the founding of the UN in 1945.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
